overview:
Joe Morley is an executive and consultant from the digital media industry.

He is currently Chief Operating Officer of Zamano plc, Director at Newsworthie Ltd and Principal Consultant at Ascenso.

Originally a designer by profession he moved into sales, marketing and business development early in his career, working internationally with both high growth start-ups and NASDAQ 100 companies.

Previous to his current roles, he was Chief Executive of Trend Digital Media from 2006 to 2009. From 1999 to 2006 he held a number of roles in the Media and Entertainment Division of Autodesk Inc.

From 1996 to 1999 he was Sales and Marketing Director at REM Infografica, at the time Europe’s leading developer of 3D software for the entertainment sector whose major shareholder was Telefonica de EspaÃ±a.

He has an MBA from the IE Business school in Madrid. He is currently a member of the Institute of Directors in Ireland.
